data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>…

data.text:
The exhilaration I felt at that time, remained in my heart, 
that's why I run. For my own self-satisfaction.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>The exhilaration I felt at that time, remained in my heart, 
<story>that's why I run. For my own self-satisfaction.

data.text:
The dream I decided on for myself — those feelings 
kept building up. Since I decided that I would win 
for sure, I was able to keep working hard.
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>The dream I decided on for myself — those feelings 
<story>kept building up. Since I decided that I would win 
<story>for sure, I was able to keep working hard.

data.text: What does it mean, to run for your own sake…?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>What does it mean, to run for your own sake…?

data.text:
Huuuuh? To be able to see Spe-chan 
dawdling around here, how rare～.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Huuuuh? To be able to see Spe-chan 
<story>dawdling around here, how rare～.

data.text: Sei-chan…?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Sei-chan…?

data.text: Aw man～, they just won't bite today～.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>Aw man～, they just won't bite today～.

data.text:
Well, fishing is a battle of patience anyways, 
so I can't just go and lose heart here～
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Well, fishing is a battle of patience anyways, 
<story>so I can't just go and lose heart here～

data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>…

data.text:
…You see, I want to race in a way that 
makes everyone reel in shock～
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>…You see, I want to race in a way that 
<story>makes everyone reel in shock～

data.text: Eh…?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Eh…?

data.text:
After all, in the begining it's not like anyone had any 
expectations of me. When I was little, my results, well they 
were about what you'd expect.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>After all, in the begining it's not like anyone had any 
<story>expectations of me. When I was little, my results, well they 
<story>were about what you'd expect.

data.text: But, even so you'd definitely still be running to win.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>But, even so you'd definitely still be running to win.

data.text:
That's why, I was alwaaays thinking about how I could win you 
see, and then one day in a huge upset, I won.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>That's why, I was alwaaays thinking about how I could win you 
<story>see, and then one day in a huge upset, I won.

data.text:
So I went in with a plan, they all fell for it, and in a shocker, 
Sei-chan won! The girl who was the favorite, and everyone else 
there, all of their jaws hit the floor!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>So I went in with a plan, they all fell for it, and in a shocker, 
<story>Sei-chan won! The girl who was the favorite, and everyone else 
<story>there, all of their jaws hit the floor!

data.text:
Oh man～, that felt sooo good～. Even I didn't think that I'd ever 
be that excited because of a race.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Oh man～, that felt sooo good～. Even I didn't think that I'd ever 
<story>be that excited because of a race.

data.text:
…But well, you could call that a formative experience, I 
guess? I want to run and surprise everyone, that's the number 
one reason that I run.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>…But well, you could call that a formative experience, I 
<story>guess? I want to run and surprise everyone, that's the number 
<story>one reason that I run.

data.text:
That's why, when it comes to winning, I'll use every 
possible thing I have to win. No matter what I have to do…
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>That's why, when it comes to winning, I'll use every 
<story>possible thing I have to win. No matter what I have to do…

data.text: …Sei-chan.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>…Sei-chan.

data.text:
Spe-chan definitely had an experience like that, 
right? Something that moved you to your core, 
some kind of experience like that.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Spe-chan definitely had an experience like that, 
<story>right? Something that moved you to your core, 
<story>some kind of experience like that.

data.text: Moved me…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Moved me…

data.text:
And! And! That running from before, 
it was reeeeaaally pretty!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>And! And! That running from before, 
<story>it was reeeeaaally pretty!

data.text:
Watching Suzuka-san joyfully running, 
gave me the courage to chase after my dreams!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Watching Suzuka-san joyfully running, 
<story>gave me the courage to chase after my dreams!

data.text: I…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>I…

data.text: I… I want to run like Suzuka-san, that's what I felt.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>I… I want to run like Suzuka-san, that's what I felt.

data.text:
When I came here, the first time I saw an Uma Musume 
running in front of me, she was really fast, and really pretty.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>When I came here, the first time I saw an Uma Musume 
<story>running in front of me, she was really fast, and really pretty.

data.text:
I want to become like that… to be able to run like that, 
I look up to her, and chase after her…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>I want to become like that… to be able to run like that, 
<story>I look up to her, and chase after her…!

data.text: But still, she's still so far away but, someday for sure…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>But still, she's still so far away but, someday for sure…!

data.text:
I see, just like Suzuka-san then. 
That's another huge goal you've got there～.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>I see, just like Suzuka-san then. 
<story>That's another huge goal you've got there～.

data.text:
But, I think that's wonderful, you know? 
That's Spe-chan's reason to run, isn't it?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>But, I think that's wonderful, you know? 
<story>That's Spe-chan's reason to run, isn't it?

data.text: My reason to run…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>My reason to run…

data.text:
That's right. Right now, 
for me, this is my goal…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>That's right. Right now, 
<story>for me, this is my goal…!

data.text:
Just so you know, I'll say this too, wanting to fulfill 
the dream you've received from your mothers, that's 
also a wonderful dream, Spe-chan.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Just so you know, I'll say this too, wanting to fulfill 
<story>the dream you've received from your mothers, that's 
<story>also a wonderful dream, Spe-chan.

data.text:
And with that, we're in the same boat. The dream entrusted to me 
by Gramps, and my dream of wanting to surprise everyone―
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>And with that, we're in the same boat. The dream entrusted to me 
<story>by Gramps, and my dream of wanting to surprise everyone―

data.text:
Because I had those two dreams, 
during the [Satsuki Sho] I just couldn't give up, you see～.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Because I had those two dreams, 
<story>during the [Satsuki Sho] I just couldn't give up, you see～.

data.text:
Two dreams― because you were running to fulfill both of them, 
Sei-chan at the [Satsuki Sho] was amazing until the end…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Two dreams― because you were running to fulfill both of them, 
<story>Sei-chan at the [Satsuki Sho] was amazing until the end…

data.text: That feeling of wanting to win, yours was just that strong.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>That feeling of wanting to win, yours was just that strong.

data.text: But, this time, maybe I'm giving Spe-chan too much help～.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>But, this time, maybe I'm giving Spe-chan too much help～.

data.text:
Spe-chan is carrying the same number of dreams as me after all, 
the [Derby] might be a little tough, maybe?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Spe-chan is carrying the same number of dreams as me after all, 
<story>the [Derby] might be a little tough, maybe?

data.text: Yeah, this time I won't lose to Sei-chan.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah, this time I won't lose to Sei-chan.

data.text: After all, my dreams ― I have 3 of them that I want to fulfill.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>After all, my dreams ― I have 3 of them that I want to fulfill.

data.text: Mine, my birth Mom's, and the Mom who raised me!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Mine, my birth Mom's, and the Mom who raised me!

data.text: That's why, I will win the [Derby]…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>That's why, I will win the [Derby]…!

data.text: Oh? You've said it now～.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>Oh? You've said it now～.

data.text:
In that case, from here on, I won't be helping you! From now on, 
you should get your advice from Trainer-san, besides, it looked 
like he was super worried.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>In that case, from here on, I won't be helping you! From now on, 
<story>you should get your advice from Trainer-san, besides, it looked 
<story>like he was super worried.

data.text: …And, we're rivals from now on!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>…And, we're rivals from now on!

data.text: Thank you, Sei-chan…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Thank you, Sei-chan…!

data.text: Trainer-saaaa～nn!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Trainer-saaaa～nn!!

data.text: Hold on, hold on! I'm opening it!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>Hold on, hold on! I'm opening it!

data.text:
Trainer-san!! Please help me with 
my training for the [Derby]!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san!! Please help me with 
<story>my training for the [Derby]!

data.text:
This year, this day has finally arrived! 
The all-important [Tokyo Yuushun - The Japan Derby]!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>This year, this day has finally arrived! 
<story>The all-important [Tokyo Yuushun - The Japan Derby]!

data.text:
From those known as the Golden Generation, 
just which Uma Musume will take hold of the ultimate glory!?
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>From those known as the Golden Generation, 
<story>just which Uma Musume will take hold of the ultimate glory!?

data.text:
Stay calm, stay calm… be careful at the final corner… 
be mindful of my pace…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Stay calm, stay calm… be careful at the final corner… 
<story>be mindful of my pace…

data.text:
Yeah, yeah! All that's left is your feelings, your feelings!! 
Just like Derbyyyyyyyy～, that kind of feeling is important!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, yeah! All that's left is your feelings, your feelings!! 
<story>Just like Derbyyyyyyyy～, that kind of feeling is important!

data.text:
It's pretty obvious but, to be called the Derby Uma Musume, you 
have to win this one chance you have at the [Derby], go hit 'em 
with those strong feelings!
data.name: Winning Ticket
data.processed:
<story>It's pretty obvious but, to be called the Derby Uma Musume, you 
<story>have to win this one chance you have at the [Derby], go hit 'em 
<story>with those strong feelings!

data.text: Strong feelings…! I got it!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Strong feelings…! I got it!

data.text:
You've been properly working hard this whole 
time. Run with confidence in yourself, and you'll 
definitely win on this grand stage.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>You've been properly working hard this whole 
<story>time. Run with confidence in yourself, and you'll 
<story>definitely win on this grand stage.

data.text:
You've been properly working hard this whole 
time. Run with confidence in yourself, and you'll 
definitely win on this grand stage.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>You've been properly working hard this whole 
<story>time. Run with confidence in yourself, and you'll 
<story>definitely win on this grand stage.

data.text:
Um… Trainer-san, and everyone else too, 
thank you very much for helping me out with training!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Um… Trainer-san, and everyone else too, 
<story>thank you very much for helping me out with training!

data.text:
I've been worried that I've been lacking something 
this whole time but… I've realized that I do 
have a proper dream that I want to fulfill.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>I've been worried that I've been lacking something 
<story>this whole time but… I've realized that I do 
<story>have a proper dream that I want to fulfill.

data.text:
The promise with my Moms about becoming "Japan's 
#1"… and for the sake of catching up to the 
one I admire, I'll run with everything I have!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>The promise with my Moms about becoming "Japan's 
<story>#1"… and for the sake of catching up to the 
<story>one I admire, I'll run with everything I have!

data.text: Spe-chan's run, we'll be watching closely.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed: <story>Spe-chan's run, we'll be watching closely.

data.text: Yeah, I'll be off!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah, I'll be off!

data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>…

data.text: Looks like you're all fired up, aren't you, Spe-chan?
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>Looks like you're all fired up, aren't you, Spe-chan?

data.text: Yeah, I'm overflowing with the feeling of wanting to win!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah, I'm overflowing with the feeling of wanting to win!

data.text:
The same applies to me… on top of the [Derby] 
being such a grand stage, until now, my desire 
to win has never been stronger.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>The same applies to me… on top of the [Derby] 
<story>being such a grand stage, until now, my desire 
<story>to win has never been stronger.

data.text:
Everyone has a dream, huh, I guess it 
makes sense why we're all fired up.
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed:
<story>Everyone has a dream, huh, I guess it 
<story>makes sense why we're all fired up.

data.text:
From this point on, we're rivals… 
I'll have you show me everything you've got.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>From this point on, we're rivals… 
<story>I'll have you show me everything you've got.

data.text: …In that case, let's all give it everything we've got!
data.name: Seiun Sky
data.processed: <story>…In that case, let's all give it everything we've got!

data.text: Yeah…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Yeah…!

data.text:
From the Classic grade, 18 Uma Musume are 
settling in to the gates for this grand stage!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>From the Classic grade, 18 Uma Musume are 
<story>settling in to the gates for this grand stage!

data.text:
2400m ahead, there will be glory for only 1! 
[Tokyo Yuushun - The Japan Derby] ― Starts now!!
data.name: Commentator
data.processed:
<story>2400m ahead, there will be glory for only 1! 
<story>[Tokyo Yuushun - The Japan Derby] ― Starts now!!
